The date and source of the original Face: The expert mentions that the post was published on March 27, 2020, on Facebook.
Description of the content of the post: The expert provides a description of the post, which includes the text written in both Malay and English, mentioning a specific incident at Ya Kun Compass1 where a customer was fined for sitting in a crossed space.
Reference to a screenshot of the mislead: The expert mentions that there is a screenshot of the misleading Facebook post included in the analysis.
Official statement from Enterprise Singa: The expert refers to a statement issued by Enterprise Singapore on its Facebook page, which clarifies that the claim is false and explains the role of safe distancing ambassadors in the implementation of safe distancing measures.
